definition: to grasp/to hold/to operate/to manage/to control/to steer/to exercise/to drill (practice)/to play/to speak (a language)
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

pinyin: wang3 luo4 cao1 zuo4 xi4 tong3

sentences.english: Each operating system makes its own unique demands on available memory resources.
sentences.chinese: 每个操作系统都有自己对可用内存资源的独特需求。

sentences.english: Tenants share the operating system and servers.
sentences.chinese: 租户共享操作系统和服务器。

sentences.english: There are wide application areas for Internet-based teleoperation systems.
sentences.chinese: 基于互联网的遥操作系统具有广阔的应用前景。

sentences.english: Whether the operating system has performed an operation during the interval.
sentences.chinese: 在此间隔内操作系统是否执行了操作。

sentences.english: What kinds of operating systems can you use to implement the portal?
sentences.chinese: 可以使用哪几种操作系统实现门户？

sentences.english: They are fundamentally incapable of performing normal operating system tasks.
sentences.chinese: 它们根本不能执行常见的操作系统任务。

sentences.english: Microsoft announced a Windows Cloud OS.
sentences.chinese: 微软公布了其云计算操作系统。

sentences.english: How to enable my kernel to support CPU hotplug?
sentences.chinese: 该怎样激活我的操作系统内核才能支持CPU热插拔？

sentences.english: The operating system's file system manager allocates and manages the space.
sentences.chinese: 操作系统文件系统管理器负责分配和管理这个空间。

sentences.english: If you are willing to adjust, it's the best computer operating system out there.
sentences.chinese: 如果你愿意去适应，它堪称当前最好的电脑操作系统。

sentences.english: WebKit is designed to work on multiple operating systems.
sentences.chinese: WebKit被设计为能够在多个操作系统上运行。

sentences.english: An approach of teleoperation system is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 给出了一种遥操作系统实现方案。

sentences.english: Invoke the file from a command line, or click it depending on your operating system. The script putters around for a while before outputting something like this
sentences.chinese: 从命令行调用文件，或者根据操作系统单击文件。

sentences.english: Learn how to harden the major operating systems and develop an understanding of hacking techniques.
sentences.chinese: 学习如何加强主流操作系统和发展对黑客技术的理解。

sentences.english: Microsoft, for instance, remains firmly attached to its Windows operating system (see article).
sentences.chinese: 比如微软就依然坚定不移地死守视窗操作系统。

sentences.english: The Cray also, of course, runs Linux.
sentences.chinese: 当然，克雷同样运行Linux操作系统。

definition: see 開放源碼|开放源码[kai1 fang4 yuan2 ma3]
